thread.title: Phil Neville celebrates 40th birthday in style - with David Beckham in Paris - Manchester Evening News

author: Dianne Bourne
title: Phil Neville celebrates 40th birthday in style - with David Beckham in Paris - Manchester Evening News

organizations.name: manchester evening news get manchester united fc

text:
Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Former Manchester United legend Phil Neville has been toasting his 40th birthday in style - with a lads trip to Paris with David Beckham. 
Phil and fellow Reds star brother Gary were joined by their former team-mate Becks for a boys night out to France’s capital of cool at the weekend to mark Phil’s big 4-0. 
And in photos Phil posted from his night out, it appears the lads went for the full on French experience - showing off a plate of l’escargots (snails) as well as plenty of vin and du pain (bread and plonk) at a posh-looking wood-panelled restaurant. 
Phil, Gary and David, part of United’s legendary Class of ‘92, were joined by their pal, football agent Dave Gardner for the birthday celebrations. 
And Phil’s brother Gary couldn’t resist uploading a video on his Instagram page of the moment waiters brought him a slice of what looked like Tiramisu cake with a candle in as they cheered, sang happy birthday and video-ed the special moment on their phones. Phil Neville raises a glass as a birthday cake is brought out in Paris (Photo: Instagram/Gary Neville) Read More Fans praise Kym Marsh and Jane Danson for "intense" and "heartbreaking" Coronation Street scenes 
The lads have also been making the most of their time in Paris, and posted pictures of themselves visiting the city’s most famous landmark, the Eiffel Tower. 
And it appears the group have travelled without their glamorous other halves, including David's fashion guru wife Victoria Beckham, and Dave's movie star fiancee Liv Tyler. Phil Neville celebrates his 40th birthday with Dave Gardner, David Beckham and brother Gary in Paris, as pictured on his Instagram page (Photo: Instagram/Phil Neville) 
But while you can take the lads out of Premier League football, it seems you can’t take away that passion for training. 
For on Phil’s birthday morning, he posted that he and Gary had a RUN to the Eiffel Tower! 
What a way to work off the snails... Phil Neville celebrates his 40th birthday with brother Gary Neville in Paris, as pictured on his Instagram page (Photo: Instagram/Phil Neville) Read More
